price: 我确已把枷锁放在他们的脖子上，那些枷锁达到下巴，所以他们不能低头。
arabic: إِنَّا جَعَلۡنَا فِيٓ أَعۡنَٰقِهِمۡ أَغۡلَٰلٗا فَهِيَ إِلَى ٱلۡأَذۡقَانِ فَهُم مُّقۡمَحُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: innā jaʿalnā fī aʿnāqihim aghlālan fahiya ilā al-adhqāni fahum muq'maḥūna
